title: What's News: World-Wide
text:
The first Merck-made Covid-19 shots developed in collaboration with Johnson & Johnson were shipped after a speedy manufacturing run-up.

A booster shot of Pfizer and BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine provides good protection against severe illness from the Omicron variant, while those without a third shot are highly vulnerable, according to a new Israeli study.

Biden this week will lobby Sen. Manchin in an attempt to lock in a deal on a roughly $2 trillion social-policy and climate bill that Democrats hope to finish by Christmas.

Israel's prime minister will meet Abu Dhabi's crown prince Monday in the first official trip to the U.A.E. by an Israeli leader since the countries established diplomatic ties.

What's News: World-Wide
